page.title: 10TRANSPORT AROUND CLATFORD
page.content: {TRANSPORT}to the local villages is rather limited now. At one time a railway ran through {GOODWORTH {CLATFORD}on to Southampton.A{RAILWAY} also ran through Wherwell and on Whitchurch. The two lines met at Fullerton.Both these rail lines no longer exist.At one time the Andover Canal ran through Goodworth Clatford too Southampton.Not the only transport left is the bus service.These are the places that{BUSES }run through, Goodworth Clatford and Wherwell go from Andover to Winchester via Goodworth Clatford, Wherwell, Barton Stacey and Sutton Scotney. This is an infrequent service,four buses each way on week days, two on Saturdays and Sundays.Most people rely on car transport.Though there is a free mini bus on Thursdays to Andover and back for shoppers from Goodworth Clatford.
